name: Woods
description: A wide open area, in the middle of the woods. In front of you there is a big door to some kind of building.

name: The hall
description: An elegant hall stands in front of you, with artistic paintings on the walls, a clean red carpet on the ground and a big chandelier on the ceiling. Besides the big door behind you, there are three iron door on each direction. An old key lies on the middle of the hall.
